Articles.Content:
So I suddenly find myself in need of a greater variety of RTGs. I have Near Future Electrical and the one from Aies, but I remember there being a mod out there, stockalike or something similar, which had a wide variety of RTG shapes an sizes. Can anyone point me in the right direction?

Thanks.

[RLA Stockalike](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/90218) has a smaller sized RTG.

Moved this over to General Add-on Affairs as it's a request for mod recommendations.

Sorry about the misplaced thread. I do already have RLA, but it's not the one I'm thinking about. The mod I'm remembering had 5-7 different RTG's ranging from a small cube sized all the way up to a couple of meters in diameter. Mostly I'm looking for the variety so I can keep part count down by putting a larger RTG on board instead of multiple smaller ones.
